channel.title: pidgin in whonix 14
channel.description:
given the various issues that have come up in a number of topics involving xmpp clients, i've decided to stick with pidgin in my own guide until another better client comes along. at the moment, coyim is looking nice but is missing a rather important feature.
when i installed pidgin for a test run in a whonix 14 workstation, all of the unsafe protocols are back. was hardening of pidgin dropped with whonix 14?

item.title: pidgin in whonix 14
item.dc:creator: tempest
item.description:
i found the answer in the changelog. i have not tried it yet, but has anyone used the old apparmor profile in whonix 14 and encountered any issues?

Read full topic

Pidgin works great on my Whonix 14 as it was on Whonix 13.
